head.title: Clinton Community School District | Connect, Empower, Engage, and Empower All Learners to Make a Positive Impact | Clinton,WI

body.script: var gaJsHost = (("https:" == document.location.protocol) ? "https://ssl." : "http://www."); document.write(unescape("%3Cscript src='" + gaJsHost + "google-analytics.com/ga.js' type='text/javascript'%3E%3C/script%3E"));

div.p: Clinton Community School District is committed to providing a safe and inclusive environment in which we connect, engage, empower, and prepare all learners to make a positive impact.

Clintons Varsity esports team won the Piltover Conference Championship!
The team finished 7-1 and advanced through the first two rounds of playoffs before the State Semi-finals and Championship were put on hold. The hope is they will be able to finish up the State Semi-Finals and Championship toward the end of the school year and in the mean time await the raising of the first esports Conference Title Flag in the High School Gym.
GO Cougars!
div.a: Read more on Cougars Win Conference Title!

div.p: The District will be engaging in virtual learning until further notice. Please Click here for our Virtual and Alternative Learning Portal.
As COVID-19 continues to be a problem for communities the Clinton health services department has put together a webpage with information regarding COVID-19 that also includes signs and symptoms as...

The District is currently closed until further notice.
Students will be engaging in Virtual learning during this closure.
We will continue to update students, parents, and community...

a.span: Read more on District is Closed

div.p:

These meals are available to anyone who is 18 years or younger.
